about_the_game:
Welcome to the World of Robot Combat with "AI.Gears"!

Game Overview

"AI.Gears" is an innovative robot combat game that combines advanced technology and creativity, allowing players to assemble and customize robots for strategic battles.

Features


Diverse Robots
Encounter robots with distinct styles and abilities in "AI.Gears." Players can strategize and leverage these diverse robots to their advantage.

Customization
Freedom to assemble and modify robots according to personal preferences, enhancing the strategic depth of the gaming experience.

Reinforcement Learning AI
The game employs reinforcement learning AI in an automatic combat system, enabling robots to learn and improve their performance, providing a unique element to the gaming experience.

1v1 Tag Matches
Engage in 1v1 tag matches, where cooperation and strategy with a partner are crucial for victory.

Real-time PvP and PvE
Rich real-time PvP and PvE content allows players to test and enhance their combat skills in various scenarios.


"AI.Gears" invites players to explore the limitless possibilities of robot combat, offering a diverse range of strategic elements and enjoyment. Challenge yourself today!

ext_user_account_notice: Account creation is required through the game launcher
name: AI.Gears : Team Tag Battle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 이상
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 이상(4GB RAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: "AI.Gears" offers innovative robot combat with diverse, customizable robots and 1v1 matches. Featuring reinforcement learning AI, it provides rich PvP and PvE content for a diverse combat experience. Join the world of varied robot battles in "AI.Gears."
